venue.name: Microsoft New England Research & Development Center (NERD)

item.description:
Our October Boston BizSpark Meetup will be held on Wednesday, October 20th at Microsoft Research Center located at One Memorial Drive in Cambridge. We are happy to be participating in the Boston Regional Entrepreneurship Week as well!

We will be in the Horace Mann room. The security officer will direct attendees to the correct floor. There is parking available in the building. Parking is free on the street in front of the building at 6 PM and there is paid parking in the basement garage. It's also a 3 minute walk from Kendall Square MBTA station.

At 6:30 PM Sonny Soriano will pitch his online collaboration startup wRaise and at 7 PM Patrick Hereford will pitch his fantasy sports management application startup HuddleHub to Frank Andrasco of Egan-Managed Capital for potential next steps in the funding process.

Then at 7:30 PM Dave Fogel, Principal at Swifton CFOs, will teach the techniques that will get your startup's financial projections noticed by investors as well as those mistakes that will get you rejected.

Dave Fogel has more than 20 years experience working with emerging companies and is adept at preparing Swifton's clients for the investor presentation.

Afterwards we will go around the room introducing ourselves and asking the group for advice | opinions on any startup-related issues members are facing.

Microsoft will provide pizza. What a generous organization!

Please RSVP and bring guests. We're always open to suggestions for topics for experts to speak on as well.

-Marsh Sutherland
item.name: Financial Projections for Pitch Decks | wRaise & HuddleHub live pitches
